verses.verse: ( Qualifications for Overseers) ( ( 630 1:5-9 ; 670 5:1-4 )) Πιστὸς <WG4103> Pistos [This is] a trustworthy ὁ <WG3588> ho - λόγος <WG3056> logos saying : εἴ <WG1487> ei If τις <WG5100> tis anyone ἐπισκοπῆς <WG1984> episkopēs an overseer , ὀρέγεται <WG3713> oregetai aspires to be καλοῦ <WG2570> kalou a noble ἔργου <WG2041> ergou task . ἐπιθυμεῖ <WG1937> epithymei he desires

δεῖ <WG1163> dei must οὖν <WG3767> oun then , τὸν <WG3588> ton An ἐπίσκοπον <WG1985> episkopon overseer , ἀνεπίλημπτον <WG423> anepilēmpton above reproach , εἶναι <WG1510> einai be μιᾶς <WG1520> mias of but one γυναικὸς <WG1135> gynaikos wife , ( Or faithful to his wife; also in verse 12) ἄνδρα <WG435> andra [the] husband νηφάλιον <WG3524> nēphalion temperate , σώφρονα <WG4998> sōphrona self-controlled , κόσμιον <WG2887> kosmion respectable , φιλόξενον <WG5382> philoxenon hospitable , διδακτικόν <WG1317> didaktikon able to teach ,

μὴ <WG3361> mē not πάροινον <WG3943> paroinon dependent on wine , μὴ <WG3361> mē not πλήκτην <WG4131> plēktēn violent ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἐπιεικῆ <WG1933> epieikē gentle , ἄμαχον <WG269> amachon peaceable , ἀφιλάργυρον <WG866> aphilargyron [and] free of the love of money .

τοῦ <WG3588> tou [his] ἰδίου <WG2398> idiou own οἴκου <WG3624> oikou household καλῶς <WG2573> kalōs well προϊστάμενον <WG4291> proistamenon [An overseer must] manage τέκνα <WG5043> tekna [his] children ἔχοντα <WG2192> echonta [and] keep ἐν <WG1722> en under ὑποταγῇ <WG5292> hypotagē control , μετὰ <WG3326> meta with πάσης <WG3956> pasēs complete σεμνότητος <WG4587> semnotētos dignity .

εἰ <WG1487> ei if δέ <WG1161> de [For] τις <WG5100> tis someone τοῦ <WG3588> tou [his] ἰδίου <WG2398> idiou own οἴκου <WG3624> oikou household , προστῆναι <WG4291> prostēnai to manage οὐκ <WG3756> ouk does not οἶδεν <WG1492> oiden know πῶς <WG4459> pōs how ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias [the] church Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ? ἐπιμελήσεται <WG1959> epimelēsetai [how] can he care for

μὴ <WG3361> mē [He must] not [be] νεόφυτον <WG3504> neophyton a recent convert , ἵνα <WG2443> hina vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv τυφωθεὶς <WG5187> typhōtheis or he may become conceited εἰς <WG1519> eis under κρίμα <WG2917> krima [ the same ] condemnation ἐμπέσῃ <WG1706> empesē [and] fall τοῦ <WG3588> tou as the διαβόλου <WG1228> diabolou devil .

δεῖ <WG1163> dei he must δὲ <WG1161> de Furthermore καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . , μαρτυρίαν <WG3141> martyrian reputation καλὴν <WG2570> kalēn a good ἔχειν <WG2192> echein have ἀπὸ <WG575> apo with τῶν <WG3588> tōn vvv ἔξωθεν <WG1855> exōthen outsiders , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv εἰς <WG1519> eis into ὀνειδισμὸν <WG3680> oneidismon disgrace ἐμπέσῃ <WG1706> empesē he will not fall καὶ <WG2532> kai and παγίδα <WG3803> pagida [into the] snare τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the διαβόλου <WG1228> diabolou devil .

( Qualifications for Deacons) ( ( 510 6:1-7 )) Διακόνους <WG1249> Diakonous Deacons ὡσαύτως <WG5615> hōsautōs likewise σεμνούς <WG4586> semnous [must be] dignified , μὴ <WG3361> mē not διλόγους <WG1351> dilogous double-tongued μὴ <WG3361> mē [or] οἴνῳ <WG3631> oinō wine πολλῷ <WG4183> pollō to much προσέχοντας <WG4337> prosechontas given μὴ <WG3361> mē [or] αἰσχροκερδεῖς <WG146> aischrokerdeis greedy for money .

ἔχοντας <WG2192> echontas They must hold τὸ <WG3588> to to the μυστήριον <WG3466> mystērion mystery τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs faith ἐν <WG1722> en with καθαρᾷ <WG2513> kathara a clear συνειδήσει <WG4893> syneidēsei conscience .

καὶ <WG2532> kai Additionally οὗτοι <WG3778> houtoi they δὲ <WG1161> de . . . , δοκιμαζέσθωσαν <WG1381> dokimazesthōsan must first be tested πρῶτον <WG4412> prōton . . . . εἶτα <WG1534> eita Then , διακονείτωσαν <WG1247> diakoneitōsan let them serve as deacons . ἀνέγκλητοι <WG410> anenklētoi above reproach , ὄντες <WG1510> ontes if they are

Γυναῖκας <WG1135> Gynaikas [the] women ( Or their wives) ὡσαύτως <WG5615> hōsautōs In the same way , σεμνάς <WG4586> semnas [must be] dignified , μὴ <WG3361> mē not διαβόλους <WG1228> diabolous slanderers , νηφαλίους <WG3524> nēphalious [but] temperate πιστὰς <WG4103> pistas [and] faithful ἐν <WG1722> en in πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin all things .

Διάκονοι <WG1249> Diakonoi A deacon ἔστωσαν <WG1510> estōsan must be μιᾶς <WG1520> mias of but one γυναικὸς <WG1135> gynaikos wife , ἄνδρες <WG435> andres [the] husband τέκνων <WG5043> teknōn [of his] children καλῶς <WG2573> kalōs a good προϊστάμενοι <WG4291> proistamenoi manager καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῶν <WG3588> tōn [of his] ἰδίων <WG2398> idiōn own οἴκων <WG3624> oikōn household .

οἱ <WG3588> hoi those who γὰρ <WG1063> gar For καλῶς <WG2573> kalōs well [as deacons] διακονήσαντες <WG1247> diakonēsantes have served βαθμὸν <WG898> bathmon standing ἑαυτοῖς <WG1438> heautois for themselves καλὸν <WG2570> kalon a high περιποιοῦνται <WG4046> peripoiountai acquire καὶ <WG2532> kai and πολλὴν <WG4183> pollēn great παρρησίαν <WG3954> parrēsian confidence ἐν <WG1722> en in πίστει <WG4102> pistei [the] faith τῇ <WG3588> tē that [is] ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus .

Ταῦτά <WG3778> Tauta these things σοι <WG4771> soi you γράφω <WG1125> graphō I am writing ( The Mystery of Godliness) ἐλπίζων <WG1679> elpizōn [Although] I hope ἐλθεῖν <WG2064> elthein to come πρὸς <WG4314> pros to σὲ <WG4771> se you ‹ἐν <WG1722> en vvv τάχει› <WG5034> tachei soon ,

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean in case δὲ <WG1161> de - βραδύνω <WG1019> bradynō I am delayed , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that εἰδῇς <WG1492> eidēs you will know πῶς <WG4459> pōs how δεῖ <WG1163> dei each one must ἐν <WG1722> en in οἴκῳ <WG3624> oikō household , Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s ἀναστρέφεσθαι <WG390> anastrephesthai conduct himself ἥτις <WG3748> hētis which ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin is ἐκκλησία <WG1577> ekklēsia [the] church Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God , ζῶντος <WG2198> zōntos of [the] living στῦλος <WG4769> stylos [the] pillar καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἑδραίωμα <WG1477> hedraiōma foundation τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias truth .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai vvv ὁμολογουμένως <WG3672> homologoumenōs By common confession , μέγα <WG3173> mega great : ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin is τὸ <WG3588> to the τῆς <WG3588> tēs - εὐσεβείας <WG2150> eusebeias of godliness μυστήριον <WG3466> mystērion mystery Ὃς <WG3739> Hos [He] ἐφανερώθη <WG5319> ephanerōthē appeared ( Literally He who appeared; BYZ and TR God appeared) ἐν <WG1722> en in σαρκί <WG4561> sarki [the] flesh , ἐδικαιώθη <WG1344> edikaiōthē was vindicated ἐν <WG1722> en by πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati [the] Spirit , ( Or vindicated in spirit) ὤφθη <WG3708> ōphthē was seen ἀγγέλοις <WG32> angelois by angels , ἐκηρύχθη <WG2784> ekērychthē was proclaimed ἐν <WG1722> en among ἔθνεσιν <WG1484> ethnesin [the] nations , ἐπιστεύθη <WG4100> episteuthē was believed in ἐν <WG1722> en throughout κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō [the] world , ἀνελήμφθη <WG353> anelēmphthē was taken up ἐν <WG1722> en in δόξῃ <WG1391> doxē glory .
